contentrichtext.text: '''DERA''' may refer as an abbreviation or acronym to: *[[Defence Evaluation and Research Agency]] *[[Downtown Eastside Residents Association]] – in Vancouver, British Columbia *[[Direct Epitope Recognition Assay]] *Disaster preparedness and Emergency Response Association *[[Diesel Emissions Reduction Act]] '''Dera''' may also refer to: * [[Dera (woreda)]], a woreda in the Amhara Region of Ethiopia * [[Daraa]], a city in Syria * Dera or Dehra: a camp or a settlement, specially a religious establishment in India such as: ** [[Dera Baba Nanak]] ** [[Dera Sacha Sauda]], a sect at Sirsa, Haryana, India ** [[Dera Sach Khand]] ** [[Dehra Doon]] ** [[Derasar]]: a Jain temple * [[Dera (woreda)]] * [[Dera, Oromia (woreda)]] * [[Dera, Ethiopia]] * [[Dera]] {{lang-ur|ڈیرہ }}) is a [[Punjabi language|Punjabi]] and [[Seraiki language|Seraiki]] language word meaning ''[[Camp (disambiguation)|camp]]'' or settlement. ** [[Dera Allah Yar]] ** [[Dera Bugti District]] ** [[Dera Bugti]] ** [[Dera Dildar]] ** [[Dera Ghazi Khan District]] ** [[Dera Ghazi Khan Division]] ** [[Dera Ghazi Khan International Airport]] ** [[Dera Ghazi Khan Tehsil]] ** [[Dera Ghazi Khan]] ** [[Dera Ismail Khan Airport]] ** [[Dera Ismail Khan District]] ** [[Dera Ismail Khan Division]] ** [[Dera Ismail Khan Tehsil]] ** [[Dera Ismail Khan]] ** [[Dera Murad Jamali]] ** [[FR Dera Ismael Khan]] ** [[Saddar Dera Bugti]] {{disambig}}
